titles.title: A resolution relating to the death of the Honorable Adlai Ewing Stevenson III, former Senator for the State of Illinois.
A resolution relating to the death of the Honorable Adlai Ewing Stevenson III, former Senator for the State of Illinois.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life of Senator Adlai Stevenson III and offers the condolences of the Senate regarding his death.
